head.title: Two Law Firms In White Plains Merge

hedline.hl1: Two Law Firms In White Plains Merge

abstract.p: DelBello, Donnellan, Weingarten, Tartaglia, Wise & Wiederkehr law firm in White Plains, NY, merges with Hecker, Colasurdo & Associates of White Plains (S)

block.p: Seeking to expand its asset recovery and mortgage foreclosure business, the White Plains firm of DelBello, Donnellan, Weingarten, Tartaglia, Wise & Wiederkehr, with 26 lawyers, has merged with Hecker, Colasurdo & Associates, also of White Plains, which has 4 lawyers.
The merger creates a new firm, which will use name of the larger firm.

Seeking to expand its asset recovery and mortgage foreclosure business, the White Plains firm of DelBello, Donnellan, Weingarten, Tartaglia, Wise & Wiederkehr, with 26 lawyers, has merged with Hecker, Colasurdo & Associates, also of White Plains, which has 4 lawyers.
The merger creates a new firm, which will use name of the larger firm.

Robert Hecker, the senior partner in Hecker, Colasurdo & Associates, said that despite the healthy economy, there is no shortage of his firm's specialty, foreclosure work. He said consumer confidence has resulted in increased personal spending ''that is catching up with many people.''
